alert.note: Alert for Upper San Joaquin River; Yosemite NP outside of the valley; Yosemite Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 12 at 8:49AM PST until January 14 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 23 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Yosemite NP outside of the valley, Yosemite Valley and Upper San Joaquin River. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 10 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Upper San Joaquin River; Yosemite NP outside of the valley; Yosemite Valley
